languages.text: "Я беден как мышь, и все же мне есть что предложить вам в благодарность! Я изучал буклет и обнаружил там кое-что интересное — шифрованное послание, раскиданное по разным страницам. В форме загадки там описывались некоторые примечательные места Футфола. Полагаю, что это — дело рук создателей буклета. Быть может, эти загадки ведут к каким-то открытиям? Я с радостью поделюсь с вами тем, что мне удалось узнать!"

"I'm poor as a church mouse, but I still have something to offer you as a token of my appreciation! After studying the booklet thoroughly, I discovered something interesting — a ciphered message scattered throughout its pages. Taking the form of a riddle, it described certain places of interest on Footfall. I believe it is the work of the booklet's creators. What if these riddles lead to something? A wondrous discovery? I will gladly share what I've been able to learn with you!"
languages.original_text: "Я беден как мышь, и все же мне есть что предложить вам в благодарность! Я изучал буклет и обнаружил там кое-что интересное — шифрованное послание, раскиданное по разным страницам. В форме загадки там описывались некоторые примечательные места Футфола. Полагаю, что это — дело рук создателей буклета. Быть может, эти загадки ведут к каким-то открытиям? Я с радостью поделюсь с вами тем, что мне удалось узнать!"

After studying the booklet thoroughly, I discovered something interesting — a ciphered message scattered throughout its pages. In the form of a riddle, it described certain places of interest on Footfall. I believe this is the work of the booklet's creators. Maybe these riddles lead to discoveries of some sort? I will gladly share what I've been able to find out with you!"

languages.text: 「食べ残しを求めるネズミのように貧乏な私ではありますが、それでも感謝の気持ちを示したいのです！その小冊子をよく読んでみたところ、面白いものを発見しました。ページの合間に暗号が隠されているのです。なぞなぞ形式で、フットフォールにある特定の場所について書かれています。この小冊子を作った人々の仕業でしょうね。なぞなぞを解けば不思議な発見があるのでは、と踏んでいます。興味があれば、私が学んだことをぜひあなたにお伝えしたいです！」
languages.original_text: "I'm poor as a church mouse, but I still have something to offer you as a token of my appreciation! After studying the booklet thoroughly, I discovered something interesting — a ciphered message scattered throughout its pages. Taking the form of a riddle, it described certain places of interest on Footfall. I believe it is the work of the booklet's creators. What if these riddles lead to something? A wondrous discovery? I will gladly share what I've been able to learn with you!"

traits.locale_text: 「食べ残しを求めるネズミのように貧乏な私ではありますが、それでも感謝の気持ちを示したいのです！その小冊子をよく読んでみたところ、面白いものを発見しました。ページの合間に暗号が隠されているのです。なぞなぞ形式で、フットフォールにある特定の場所について書かれています。この小冊子を作った人々の仕業でしょうね。なぞなぞを解けば不思議な発見があるのでは、と踏んでいます。興味があれば、私が学んだことをぜひあなたにお伝えしたいです！」

languages.text: “我穷得就像教堂里的老鼠一样，但我还是有东西要送给您，以表达我的感谢！我仔细研究了这本小册子，发现了某些有趣的事情——这页书上有一条加密的信息，以谜语的形式描述了落脚港上的某处名胜古迹。我相信，这是这本小册子的创作者想出来的谜语。说不定这些谜语有什么含义？说不定会让我们找到什么奇妙的发现？我很愿意与您分享我了解的一切！”
languages.original_text: "I'm poor as a church mouse, but I still have something to offer you as a token of my appreciation! After studying the booklet thoroughly, I discovered something interesting — a ciphered message scattered throughout its pages. Taking the form of a riddle, it described certain places of interest on Footfall. I believe it is the work of the booklet's creators. What if these riddles lead to something? A wondrous discovery? I will gladly share what I've been able to learn with you!"

traits.locale_text: “我穷得就像教堂里的老鼠一样，但我还是有东西要送给您，以表达我的感谢！我仔细研究了这本小册子，发现了某些有趣的事情——这页书上有一条加密的信息，以谜语的形式描述了落脚港上的某处名胜古迹。我相信，这是这本小册子的创作者想出来的谜语。说不定这些谜语有什么含义？说不定会让我们找到什么奇妙的发现？我很愿意与您分享我了解的一切！”

languages.text: «Soy más pobre que un ratón de iglesia, pero ¡tengo algo que ofrecerle como agradecimiento! Tras estudiar el libreto en profundidad, descubrí algo que me llamó la atención: un mensaje cifrado que se extendía a lo largo de sus páginas. Tenía forma de acertijo y describía ciertos puntos de interés de Paso. Creo que es obra de los creadores del libreto. ¿Y si estos acertijos conducen a algo? ¿Un descubrimiento inigualable? ¡Si quiere, le cuento lo que he hallado!».
languages.original_text: "I'm poor as a church mouse, but I still have something to offer you as a token of my appreciation! After studying the booklet thoroughly, I discovered something interesting — a ciphered message scattered throughout its pages. Taking the form of a riddle, it described certain places of interest on Footfall. I believe it is the work of the booklet's creators. What if these riddles lead to something? A wondrous discovery? I will gladly share what I've been able to learn with you!"

traits.locale_text: «Soy más pobre que un ratón de iglesia, pero ¡tengo algo que ofrecerle como agradecimiento! Tras estudiar el libreto en profundidad, descubrí algo que me llamó la atención: un mensaje cifrado que se extendía a lo largo de sus páginas. Tenía forma de acertijo y describía ciertos puntos de interés de Paso. Creo que es obra de los creadores del libreto. ¿Y si estos acertijos conducen a algo? ¿Un descubrimiento inigualable? ¡Si quiere, le cuento lo que he hallado!».

languages.text: « Je n'ai plus un sou, mais je peux tout de même vous offrir quelque chose pour vous remercier ! J'ai découvert quelque chose d'intéressant en étudiant attentivement l'opuscule : un message codé dispersé dans ses pages. Rédigé sous forme d'énigme, il décrit certains monuments de Castel. C'est certainement l'œuvre des auteurs de l'opuscule. Serait-il possible que cela mène quelque part ? À quelque merveilleuse découverte, par exemple ? Je me ferai un plaisir de partager tout ce que je sais à ce sujet avec vous ! »
languages.original_text: "I'm poor as a church mouse, but I still have something to offer you as a token of my appreciation! After studying the booklet thoroughly, I discovered something interesting — a ciphered message scattered throughout its pages. Taking the form of a riddle, it described certain places of interest on Footfall. I believe it is the work of the booklet's creators. What if these riddles lead to something? A wondrous discovery? I will gladly share what I've been able to learn with you!"

J'ai découvert quelque chose d'intéressant en étudiant attentivement l'opuscule : un message codé dispersé dans ses pages. Rédigé sous forme d'énigme, il décrit certains monuments de Castel. C'est certainement l'œuvre des auteurs de l'opuscule. Serait-il possible que cela mène quelque part ? À quelque merveilleuse découverte, par exemple ? Je me ferai un plaisir de partager tout ce que je sais à ce sujet avec vous ! »

languages.text: "Ich bin arm wie eine Kirchenmaus, habe aber dennoch etwas für Euch, als Zeichen meiner Dankbarkeit! Nach dem gründlichen Studium des Buchs habe ich etwas Interessantes entdeckt – eine verschlüsselte Nachricht, die über die Seiten verteilt ist. Es ist eine Art Rätsel und beschreibt verschiedene interessante Orte auf Footfall. Ich denke, es handelt sich um die Arbeit der Schöpfer des Büchleins. Was wäre, wenn diese Rätsel tatsächlich irgendwo hinführen? Zu einer wundersamen Entdeckung? Ich werde gerne mit Euch teilen, was ich bislang herausgefunden habe!"
languages.original_text: "I'm poor as a church mouse, but I still have something to offer you as a token of my appreciation! After studying the booklet thoroughly, I discovered something interesting — a ciphered message scattered throughout its pages. Taking the form of a riddle, it described certain places of interest on Footfall. I believe it is the work of the booklet's creators. What if these riddles lead to something? A wondrous discovery? I will gladly share what I've been able to learn with you!"

languages.text: "Beş param yok, yine de minnetimin belirtisi olarak size bir şey sunmak isterim! Kitapçığı enine boyuna inceledikten sonra, çok enteresan bir şey keşfettim: Sayfalarına dağıtılmış şifreli bir mesaj. Bilmece şeklinde Binliman'ın bazı ilginç yerlerini anlatıyor. Galiba kitapçığın yazarının işi. Ya bu bilmecelerin ucu bir şeye çıkıyorsa? Fevkalade bir keşif olmaz mı? Öğrenebildiklerimi sizinle seve seve paylaşırım!"
languages.original_text: "I'm poor as a church mouse, but I still have something to offer you as a token of my appreciation! After studying the booklet thoroughly, I discovered something interesting — a ciphered message scattered throughout its pages. Taking the form of a riddle, it described certain places of interest on Footfall. I believe it is the work of the booklet's creators. What if these riddles lead to something? A wondrous discovery? I will gladly share what I've been able to learn with you!"

traits.locale_text: "Beş param yok ama yine de size ne kadar şükran duyduğumu göstermek için paylaşabileceğim bir şey var elimde! Bu kitapçığı çok karıştırdım ya, enteresan bir şey keşfettim: Kitapçığın sayfaları boyunca saklanmış şifreli bir mesaj var. Bir bilmece şeklinde Binliman'ın bazı ilginç yerlerini anlatıyor. Sanırım bu, kitapçığın yazarlarından birinin işi. Acaba bu bilmecelerin sonunda bir şeyler var mı? Fevkalade bir keşif mesela? Öğrenebildiğim her şeyi seve seve sizinle paylaşırım!"
